overview: Ken lives alone in his own apartment and is not in touch with his family for a very long time. He is unexpectedly contacted by his younger brother after ages regarding their father's ailment. It's an experience of a father son relationship and how the past made them part ways and how difficult it is now for ken to confront his father. In his endeavour to connect with his father, he goes on a spree of cooking, hoping his father would like the dishes he prepares and that's Ken's morsel of hope.
title: Morsel of Hope
